# Social Preview Image Template

Create a 1280x640px image for GitHub social preview.

## Color Palette

- Primary: #2563eb (Blue)
- Secondary: #f59e0b (Amber/Orange)
- Background: #0f172a (Dark) or #f8fafc (Light)
- Text: #f1f5f9 (on dark) or #0f172a (on light)

## Fonts

- Heading: Inter Bold
- Body: Inter Regular

## Upload Location

Go to: Repository â†’ Settings â†’ General â†’ Social preview â†’ Edit â†’ Upload image
